content:
Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 1 of 30.


Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (18, 20), stationary, HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"初手は敵空母を可能な限り早期発見することが最優先。敵は左上(3,3)近傍にいるため、我空母は安全圏を保ちつつ左上方向へ若干接近し、同時に高性能の航空機を偵察投入して広域索敵する。空母の視界は4、艦載機は5で合成すると遠距離索敵が可能。まず空母を1ヘクス北西へ移動して索敵圏を前進させ、両編隊を分散して発艦させる。BSQ1はやや北寄り（敵の初期位置方向）へ長距離偵察、BSQ2はBSQ1と少し角度をずらして並行索敵。発艦目標は空母から22ヘクス以内かつマップ左上方向を最大限狙う座標に設定する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":{"x":0,"y":0}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. x=0 y=0 is out of squadron range. Please specify a valid coordinate, such as x=4 y=3.
Please fix your order.

{"thinking":"敵は(3,3)近傍の左上にいる見込み。安全を保ちつつ空母を北西へ移動して索敵圏を前進させ、両機を分散偵察で先に発見を狙う。空母中心から22ヘクス以内で左上方向の最遠点を狙う。BSQ1はやや上寄り、BSQ2は左寄りに分散して索敵。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":{"x":4,"y":3}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 2 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward position (4, 3) while at (17, 18).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 19), en route to target (17, 19), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (17, 18), outbound toward (4, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: on board a carrier, ready to launch., HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"BSQ1を左上へ向けて偵察投入済み。次にBSQ2も別方向から並行索敵して発見率を高める。空母は現在安全に前進中のため、位置は維持。BSQ2はやや北西寄りだが空母中心から22ヘクス以内の最上方候補として(5,5)へ発艦させて、敵付近を広くカバーする。空母は現状位置への移動を継続（変更なし）。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":{"x":5,"y":5}}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 3 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward position (5, 5) while at (17, 18).

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (17, 19), en route to target (17, 19), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (15, 14), outbound toward (4, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (17, 18), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
{"thinking":"両機を北西へ展開済み。次は空母をさらに前進させ索敵圏を押し上げるが、敵発見リスクを避けるため慎重に移動。空母をさらに1ヘクス北西(16,18)へ移動しつつ、機動の余地を残す。航空機は現在の索敵を続行、目標変更せず。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 4 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (9, 13) while at (13, 10).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (9, 13) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 18), en route to target (16, 18), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (13, 10), outbound toward (4, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (15, 14), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"BSQ1が敵航空隊を発見。敵空母は不明だが敵機の位置と進路から左上隅（3,3付近）に空母がいる可能性が高い。最優先は敵空母を先に発見すること。敵機との交戦は航空隊同士では発生しないので無視してよいが、敵機の索敵方向から我が空母が見られるリスクを評価して慎重に行動する。空母は索敵圏をさらに前進させつつ敵の発見ポイントへ届く位置へ移動する。BSQ1は既に北西方向へ近距離索敵を続行中で戻り航路で敵空母を見つける可能性があるためタスク継続。BSQ2は左上方向の未探査帯を補完するため目標をやや左上寄りの(7,6)へ変更して並行索敵させる。空母は更に1ヘクス北西へ（15,17）移動して索敵圏を前進。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":17},"launch_target":{"x":7,"y":6}}}

ERROR: invalid your order, rejected: launch_target was rejected. Currently, all air squadrons are deployed on missions, and there are no squadrons aboard the carrier. Orders cannot be issued to squadrons that are already deployed.
Please fix your order.
{"thinking":"BSQ1とBSQ2は既に展開中で索敵継続。敵機の位置から敵空母は左上（3,3付近）の可能性が高く、空母をさらに前進させて航空隊の索敵範囲を広げつつ、発見リスクを抑える。空母を北西へ1ヘクス移動して索敵圏を前進する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":17},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 5 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (10, 14) while at (12, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 16) while at (13, 11).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (12, 16) while at (15, 17).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier position unknown.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (12, 16) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 17), en route to target (15, 17), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (10, 7), outbound toward (4, 3), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (13, 10), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵航空隊ASQ1の最新位置は(12,16)。複数の目撃点から敵航空隊は左上から南東へ移動中、敵空母はさらに北西（3,3付近）にいる可能性が高い。優先は敵空母の発見であるため、空母をさらに前進して航空隊の索敵中心を左上に寄せる。現在両編隊は展開中で帰還まで目標変更不可なので空母のみ1ヘクス北西へ移動して索敵圏を拡大する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":14,"y":16},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 6 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (15, 16) while at (14, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (7, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (7, 9) while at (7, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (7, 9) while at (10, 8).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (5, 4) (previously at (5, 4)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 16) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 40/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (7, 9) (previously at (6, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 16), en route to target (14, 16), HP 100/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 5), outbound toward (5, 4), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (10, 8), outbound toward (5, 5), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1の位置が確定(5,4)。これで先手必勝のチャンス。最優先は両航空隊で敵空母を同時攻撃すること。だが発艦済みのBSQ1は既に(5,4)を目標に向かっている。BSQ2は(5,5)へ向かっており到達すれば隣接して発見・攻撃可能。空母は航空機の帰投圏内かつ攻撃支援/回避のため適度に前進させつつ被発見リスクを抑える位置へ移動する。具体的には空母をさらに北西へ接近して(13,15)に移動して航空隊の航続余裕を確保し、両機は目標変更しない（BSQ1はそのまま(5,4)、BSQ2は(5,5)で継続）。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":13,"y":15},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 7 of 30.

Recent events:
- your carrier(BC1) initiated an attack on an enemy squadron(ASQ1) while at (14, 16).
- your carrier(BC1) hit an enemy squadron(ASQ1) causing 26 damage while at (14, 16).
- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (8, 11) while at (8, 7).
- your squadron(BSQ1) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (5, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (7, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (5, 5).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (5, 4) (previously at (5, 4)), HP 100/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (15, 16) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (8, 11) (previously at (6, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (14, 16), en route to target (13, 15), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (5, 5), engaging an enemy target at (5, 4), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (7, 5), outbound toward (5, 4), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1を発見・接敵済み。BSQ1が攻撃中、BSQ2も到着して合流可能で一斉攻撃で早期撃沈を狙う。空母BC1は既に敵航空隊と交戦し被弾（HP74）しているため、敵航空隊の反撃や波状攻撃を避けるためにやや後退して被発見を減らす。具体的には空母を南東へ退避して(15,17)へ移動し、航空隊は目標を維持して敵空母への攻撃継続（発艦機は目標変更しない）。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":15,"y":17},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 8 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ1) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (5, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ1) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 21 damage while at (5, 5).
- your squadron(BSQ1) is returning to the carrier while at (5, 5).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (13, 13) while at (14, 17).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (12, 16) while at (15, 17).
- your squadron(BSQ2) set a new target toward an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (4, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is engaging an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 3).

Enemy intelligence:
- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (5, 4) (previously at (5, 4)), HP 74/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (13, 13) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (12, 16) (previously at (6, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (15, 17), en route to target (15, 17), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (5, 5), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (4, 3), engaging an enemy target at (5, 4), HP 40/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母にBSQ1とBSQ2で攻撃を継続し、早期撃沈を狙う。現在BSQ1が帰還中でHPも低いので速やかに回収して再発進準備を整えたい。空母は敵機の脅威に晒されているため、被発見を避けつつ艦載機を回収できる距離に後退して防御態勢を整える。方針：空母をやや南東へ退避して(16,18)へ移動、BSQ1は安全に着艦（帰投を継続）、BSQ2は敵空母への攻撃継続（目標変更なし）。発艦・新規命令は無し。次ターン以降、回収後に両機を連続発艦して一斉攻撃を行う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 9 of 30.

Recent events:
- your squadron(BSQ2) initiated an attack on an enemy carrier(AC1) while at (4, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ2) hit an enemy carrier(AC1) causing 13 damage while at (4, 3).
- your squadron(BSQ2) is returning to the carrier while at (4, 3).
- your carrier(BC1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (15, 17) while at (16, 18).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (7, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (11, 8) while at (7, 9).

- Enemy carrier AC1: last known position (5, 4) (previously at (5, 4)), HP 49/100.
- Enemy squadron ASQ1: last known position (11, 8) (previously at (9, 12)), HP 21/40.
- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 17) (previously at (6, 6)), HP 40/40.

Your forces:
- Your carrier BC1: position (16, 18), en route to target (16, 18), HP 74/100, speed 2, vision 4.
- Your squadron BSQ1: position (7, 9), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (4, 3), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母AC1の位置が確定しHPは49/100。今は艦載機が全て帰還中のため、まずは安全に回収して速やかに再発進準備を整える。空母は敵航空隊に見つかるリスクを下げつつ、次発進で敵空母に届く位置に維持する。敵機の位置（ASQ2が近い）を考慮し、空母を少し南へ退避して被発見を避けつつ回収圏を確保する。具体行動：空母を南へ1ヘクス移動して(16,19)へ。航空隊は帰投続行、着艦・整備後に同時再発進で集中攻撃を実施する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 10 of 30.

Recent events:

- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy carrier(AC1) at (5, 4) while at (7, 6).

- Enemy squadron ASQ2: last known position (15, 17) (previously at (6, 6)), HP 27/40.

Your forces:

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (9, 13), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (7, 6), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"敵空母位置が確定(5,4)、HP49。敵航空隊はまだ残存しBC1は被弾してHP46とやや脆弱。まずは艦載機を安全に回収してから一斉再発進し制圧するのが最善。空母は今ターンも被発見・被攻撃を避けるため近接せず、着艦圏内で回収・再発進可能な位置に留める。具体案：艦載機の帰投を優先して回収させ（現状両機帰投中）、空母は南東へ退避して敵機から少し距離を取る（17,19へ移動）。回収後は次ターンに両編隊を同時発艦して(5,4)へ向かわせ一斉攻撃で撃沈を狙う。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

Below is the current battle situation from your perspective.

Turn 11 of 30.

Recent events:

- your squadron(BSQ2) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ1) at (5, 5) while at (8, 9).
- your squadron(BSQ1) spotted an enemy squadron(ASQ2) at (13, 13) while at (12, 16).

- Your squadron BSQ1: position (12, 16), returning to the carrier, HP 19/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.
- Your squadron BSQ2: position (9, 10), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両編隊が帰還中で空母HPは46と割と低い。敵空母位置は確定(5,4)でHP49。着艦・整備後、次ターンに両機を同時発進して一斉攻撃し撃沈を狙うのが最も有効。だが敵航空隊（ASQ2）が中間にいるため発艦前に敵機の位置を考慮し、空母は被発見リスクを下げつつ着艦可能な安全圏で待機する。現状の安全維持のため空母はそのまま(17,19)に留めて回収を確実に行う。回収後は両機を同時発艦して(5,4)を目標に一斉攻撃する計画。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

- Your squadron BSQ2: position (11, 14), returning to the carrier, HP 27/40, operational range 22, speed 4, vision 5.

{"thinking":"両機はほぼ帰還完了。敵空母は(5,4)でHP49と判明している。敵機ASQ2が中間にいるため、再発進は一斉に行い敵空母を一気に撃沈するのが勝利の最短ルート。まずは着艦・整備させて完全回復させ、次ターンに両編隊を同時発艦して(5,4)を目標に指示する。空母は敵機接近を避けつつ発艦範囲を確保するため現状位置を維持して安全圏で待機する。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":17,"y":19},"launch_target":null}}

{"thinking":"BSQ1着艦完了。敵空母は確定位置(5,4)でHP49。ASQ2が中間にいるため、両編隊を同時発艦して一斉攻撃すれば撃沈可能と判断。まずはBSQ2を回収して整備し、次ターンに両機を同時発艦で(5,4)を狙う。空母は発艦・帰投圏を確保しつつ敵機の索敵を避けるため、発艦後の支援と安全確保を両立できる位置に若干前進しておく（ただし接近し過ぎず）。具体行動：空母を北西へ1ヘクス寄せて(16,18)へ移動。発艦は両機回収後まで待機（現ターンは発艦命令なし）。","action":{"carrier_target":{"x":16,"y":18},"launch_target":null}}
